Turlock.Turlock, California:
Turlock is a city in Stanislaus County, California, United States. Its estimated 2015 population of 72,292 made it the second-largest city in Stanislaus County after Modesto.


== Geography ==
Turlock lies in Stanislaus County, at 37°30′21″N 120°50′56″W (37.505725, -120.849019), between Modesto, California and Merced, California, at the intersection of State Route 99 and State Route 165.
